root['Kit']['Basic']['Name'].old_value: Wake Me Up When Slumber Ends

root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].new_value: Deals Ice DMG equal to [35|70]% of The Herta's ATK to one designated enemy, and inflicts 1 stack(s) of 'Interpretation.' Deals Ice DMG equal to [35|70]% of The Herta's ATK to the target that has been hit by this instance of Skill and adjacent targets, repeating 2 times.
root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].old_value: Deals Ice DMG equal to [35|70]% of The Herta's ATK to one designated enemy, and inflicts 1 stack(s) of 'Interpretation.' Deals Ice DMG equal to [35|70]% of The Herta's ATK to the target that has been hit by this instance of Skill and adjacent targets. This effect can repeat 2 times.

root['Kit']['Ultimate']['Desc'].new_value: Rearranges the number of 'Interpretation' stacks on all enemies, prioritizing the transfer of a higher number of 'Interpretation' stacks to Elite-level targets and above. Then, deals Ice DMG equal to [100|200]% The Herta's ATK to all enemies. When using Ultimate, increases The Herta's ATK by [40|80]%, lasting for 3 turn(s). After using the Ultimate, The Herta immediately takes action and gains 1 stack of 'Inspiration.' 'Inspiration' can stack up to 2 time(s). While having 'Inspiration,' enhances Skill to 'Hear Me Out.'
root['Kit']['Ultimate']['Desc'].old_value: Rearranges the number of 'Interpretation' stacks on all enemies, prioritizing the transfer of a higher number of 'Interpretation' stacks to Elite-level targets and above. Then, deals Ice DMG equal to [100|200]% The Herta's ATK to all enemies. When using Ultimate, increases The Herta's ATK by [32|64]%, lasting for 2 turn(s). After using the Ultimate, The Herta immediately takes action and gains 1 stack of 'Inspiration.' 'Inspiration' can stack up to 2 time(s). While having 'Inspiration,' enhances Skill to 'Hear Me Out.'

root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].new_value: When enemy targets enter battle, The Herta inflicts 1 stack of 'Interpretation' on them. When the Enhanced Skill's primary target has 'Interpretation,' the multiplier for the DMG dealt increases, with each stack granting an increase of [4|8]%/[2|4]% on the primary target/other targets respectively. If at least 2 characters follow the Path of Erudition in the team, each stack grants an additional increase of [4|8]%/[2|4]% on the primary target/other targets respectively. 'Interpretation' can stack up to 42 time(s). When using the Enhanced Skill, resets the number of 'Interpretation' stacks on the primary target to 1. After the enemy target leaves the battle or gets defeated by any unit, 'Interpretation' will be transferred, prioritizing the transfer to Elite-level targets and above.
root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].old_value: When enemy targets enter battle, The Herta inflicts 1 stack of 'Interpretation' on them. When the Enhanced Skill's primary target has 'Interpretation,' the multiplier for the DMG dealt increases, with each stack granting an increase of [4|8]%/[2.5|5]% on the primary target/other targets respectively. If at least 2 characters follow the Path of Erudition in the team, each stack grants an additional increase of [4|8]%/[2.5|5]% on the primary target/other targets respectively. 'Interpretation' can stack up to 42 time(s). When using the Enhanced Skill, resets the number of 'Interpretation' stacks on the ability's target to 1. After the enemy target leaves the battle or gets defeated by any unit, 'Interpretation' will be transferred, prioritizing the transfer to Elite-level targets and above.

root['Kit']['Technique']['Desc'].new_value: After using Technique, increases The Herta's ATK by 40% at the start of the next battle for 2 turn(s). Applies 25 'Interpretation' stack(s) to one random enemy target at the start of each wave, prioritizing Elite or rarer targets. If there are Basic Treasures in this current map, using Technique will mark up to 3 Basic Treasures' locations. After entering battle by using Technique in Simulated Universe or Divergent Universe, deals True DMG equal to 99% of the target's Max HP to enemy targets lower than Elite-level, and True DMG equal to 30% of the target's Max HP to enemy targets at Elite-level and above.
root['Kit']['Technique']['Desc'].old_value: After using Technique, increases The Herta's ATK by 40% at the start of the next battle for 2 turn(s). Applies 4 'Interpretation' stack(s) to all enemies at the start of each wave. If there are Basic Treasures in this current map, using Technique will mark up to 3 Basic Treasures' locations. After entering battle by using Technique in Simulated Universe or Divergent Universe, deals True DMG equal to 99% of the target's Max HP to enemy targets lower than Elite-level, and True DMG equal to 30% of the target's Max HP to enemy targets at Elite-level and above.

root['Traces']['Branch 1']['Desc'].new_value: When ally targets attack, inflicts 1 stack of 'Interpretation' on the hit enemy target. After attacking, for every 1 target hit by this attack, regenerates 3 fixed Energy for The Herta, counting up to a maximum of 5 targets. When using Enhanced Skill and if the target's 'Interpretation' stack is 42, increases Ice DMG dealt by The Herta by 50% until the end of this instance of Enhanced Skill.
root['Traces']['Branch 1']['Desc'].old_value: When ally targets attack, inflicts 1 stack of 'Interpretation' on the hit enemy target. After attacking, for every 1 target hit by this attack, regenerates 3 fixed Energy for The Herta, counting up to a maximum of 5 targets.

root['Traces']['Branch 2']['Desc'].new_value: When entering battle, if the team has at least 2 characters following the Path of Erudition, then increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 80%, calculates at least 3 targets when the Trace 'Aloofly Honest' calculates hit targets, applies 1 stacks of 'Interpretation' to the target that has the highest existing stacks of 'Interpretation' among the hit enemy targets after attacking, and additionally applies 2 stacks of 'Interpretation' if they are a character following the Path of Erudition.
root['Traces']['Branch 2']['Desc'].old_value: When entering battle, if the team has no fewer than 2 characters following the Path of Erudition, increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 80%. After attacking, applies 1 stacks of 'Interpretation' to the target that has the highest existing stacks of 'Interpretation' among the hit enemy targets. The Trace 'Aloofly Honest' counts at least 3 target(s) when calculating the number of targets hit.

root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].new_value: When Enhanced Skill calculates 'Interpretation,' additionally calculates 30% of the 'Interpretation' stacks on the 2 targets with the highest stacks out of the Skill's target and adjacent targets. When using Enhanced Skill to reset 'Interpretation' and if the primary target's current 'Interpretation' stack is 10 or higher, reset the stack number to 10 instead.
root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].old_value: When Enhanced Skill calculates 'Interpretation,' additionally calculates 30% of the 'Interpretation' stacks on the 2 targets with the highest stacks out of the Skill's target and adjacent targets.

root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].new_value: If enemy 'Interpretation' reaches 42 when stacks are applied or transferred to them, then The Herta gains 1 stack of 'Inspiration.' When using Enhanced Skill, The Herta's action advances by 15%. If the target's 'Interpretation' stack is 42, additionally advance The Herta's action by 25%.
root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].old_value: After an ally attacks, applies 1 stack(s) of 'Interpretation' to the enemy target hit that has the highest 'Interpretation' stacks. When enemy target are afflicted with 'Interpretation' and should the stacks reach 42, The Herta will gain 1 stack of 'Inspiration.' This effect can only trigger once per enemy target.

root['Eidolons']['4']['Desc'].new_value: The SPD of characters following the Path of Erudition in the team increases by 12%.
root['Eidolons']['4']['Desc'].old_value: The SPD of characters following the Path of Erudition in the team increases by 10%.

root['Eidolons']['6']['Desc'].new_value: The Herta's Ice RES PEN increases by 20%. When the number of enemy targets on the field is 3 (or more)/2/1, Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by 140%/250%/400%.
root['Eidolons']['6']['Desc'].old_value: Every stack of 'Starved Landscape of Vacua' additionally increases Ultimate's DMG multiplier by 4%, up to a max increase of 396%. The Trace 'Starved Landscape of Vacua' needs to be unlocked first.
